title: Course Setup Wizard
name: Course Setup Wizard
story: As an educator, I want to create a course with learning outcomes, content, and enroll students
description: Multi-step wizard for creating a course with content, onboarding, and student enrollment

triggers.given: A user initiates the course creation workflow
triggers.then: The wizard steps are loaded from this spec and the flow progresses through all steps
triggers.name: Course Setup Wizard Execution

parameters.name: Wizard Step Definitions
parameters.description: Defines the sequence and configuration of course setup wizard steps

steps.label: Course Intent
steps.description: Define course name, learning outcomes, and teaching style

steps.label: Teaching Points
steps.description: Review extracted teaching points from content

steps.label: Lesson Structure
steps.description: Configure lesson count, duration, and assessment style

steps.label: Configure AI
steps.description: Customize the AI tutor's welcome message and persona

steps.label: Launch
steps.description: Create the course and complete onboarding
